column1: Golfimbul was a king of the Orcs#Orcs and Goblins of Mount Gram.
Golfimbul led a band of Orcs in an invasion of the Shire in . Bandobras Took met Golfimbul in the Northfarthing of the Shire and defeated him in the Battle of Greenfields. During the battle Bandobras
column2: who was large enough to ride a horse
column3: charged at Golfimbul and knocked off his head with a club. According to a legend
